product_name: Nike Zoom Force 1 Snowboard Boots - Women's - 2013/2014
long_description: Nike Zoom Force 1 women's snowboard boots bring style and comfort to the snow. These team-inspired, all-mountain-focused boots deliver explosive response with a supportive, medium flex . Lace locking hardware personalizes the fit by allowing the upper and lower zones to tighten independently of each other. Molded tongue shape contours to the front of your foot and leg for comfortable toe-side turning; internal heel harnesses lock liners in place for secure heel hold. High-end synthetic waterproof leather uppers keep feet dry; full-length internal backstays give boots a medium flex for great control in turns. Custom moldable polyethylene and EVA foam liners feature an easy-to-use, secure lace-lock power strap and stretchy neoprene toe boxes for extra comfort. Warming Blanket Strobel is a heat reflective material in both the shell and liner that helps retain heat and keep the cold out. ZF1 full-length phylon midsoles/outsoles feature embedded Zoom Air cushioning for superior comfort when on your board and when walking around. Low-profile Air Force 1 shoe-inspired outsoles feature treads that grip the snow and ensure good board feel.
short_description: Nike Zoom Force 1 women's snowboard boots bring style and comfort to the snow. These team-inspired, all-mountain-focused boots deliver explosive response with a supportive, medium flex .
